name: MIKU-15
description:
Made for WASM-4, a fantasy console designed to work with WebAssembly.

This is a simple 15-Puzzle, with images of Hatsune MIku. You have to sort all the pieces until you get the final image.

  • On title screen, Press Z or X to start the game.
  • Use arrow keys to move the pieces.
  • Press X to open the game's menu, and Z to select an option.

This is my first project made for WASM-4. I hope you enjoy the game! :D
